name: Brooklyn Bridge 24"x16" Letterpress Poster (Limited Edition)
description: ORDERS WILL BEGIN SHIPPING AFTER DECEMBER 26. If this is a Christmas gift, contact me and I'll give you a hi-res image of the artwork you can include in a "Your gift is in the mail!" card. The Brooklyn Bridge re-imagined as if created entirely with type. Limited to 1,500 copies, with the first ~700 numbered copies reserved for Kickstarter backers. Letterpress printed by Bryce Knudson of Bjørn Press in Provo, Utah, United States.

name: Colosseo 24"x16" Signed Poster (Pearl)
description: Orders ship in 1–2 weeks. The Roman Coliseum, handcrafted character by character over the course of roughly 250 hours. Signed and numbered (out of 1,000). Letterpress printed on Crane Lettra Pearl by Bryce Knudson of Bjørn Press in Provo, Utah, United States. $10 shipping to anywhere in the United States. $20 to Canada or Mexico. $30 to anywhere else in the world. (Customers in the UK and other countries in Europe may be required to pay customs fees to retrieve shipment.)

name: Salt Lake 16"x24" Signed Letterpress Poster
description:
This item is out of stock but can be purchased at BYU's Museum of Art (in-store only). You can also sign up to be notified when copies are available sometime before Christmas.
The Salt Lake Temple, handcrafted character by character over the course of roughly 100 hours. Signed, but not numbered. Letterpress printed on Crane Lettra Pearl by Bryce Knudson of Bjørn Press in Provo, Utah, United States. $10 shipping to anywhere in the United States. $20 to Canada or Mexico. $30 to anywhere else in the world. (Customers in the UK and other countries in Europe may be required to pay customs fees to retrieve shipment.)

name: Colosseo 16"x24" Palatino Glyphs Poster (Unsigned)
description: Orders ship in 1–2 weeks. These glyphs are based on the work of master Italian calligrapher M. Giovambattista Palatino (ca. 1515–1575), as featured in Libro di M. Giovambattista Palatino Cittadino Romano, published in Rome around 1550 AD. Letterpress printed on Crane Lettra Pearl by Bryce Knudson of Bjørn Press in Provo, Utah, United States. $10 shipping to anywhere in the United States. $20 to Canada or Mexico. $30 to anywhere else in the world. (Customers in the UK and other countries in Europe may be required to pay customs fees to retrieve shipment.)

name: Colosseo 24"x16" Limited Edition Poster (Black)
description: Orders ship in 1–2 weeks. The Roman Coliseum, handcrafted character by character over the course of roughly 250 hours. Signed and numbered (out of 50). Letterpress printed on Somerset Velvet (Black) by Bryce Knudson of Bjørn Press in Provo, Utah, United States. $10 shipping to anywhere in the United States. $20 to Canada or Mexico. $30 to anywhere else in the world. (Customers in the UK and other countries in Europe may be required to pay customs fees to retrieve shipment.)

name: Colosseo Collection
description:
Orders ship in 1–2 weeks. Your purchase of this Colosseo Collection includes three products:
  • 24”x16” Signed Poster
  • 16”x24” Glyphs Poster
  • Stock Vector Glyphs
Letterpress printed on Crane Lettra Pearl by Bryce Knudson of Bjørn Press in Provo, Utah, United States. $10 shipping to anywhere in the United States. $20 to Canada or Mexico. $30 to anywhere else in the world. (Customers in the UK and other countries in Europe may be required to pay customs fees to retrieve shipment.)

name: Colosseo Stock Vector Glyphs (.eps)
description: These glyphs are based on the work of master Italian calligrapher M. Giovambattista Palatino (ca. 1515–1575), as featured in Libro di M. Giovambattista Palatino Cittadino Romano, published in Rome around 1550 AD. Several of the glyphs featured in the book were recreated by Cameron through hand-tracing, then as vectors, and then incorprated into the Colosseo. Shortly after purchasing, you'll be sent an email containing a link to download an .eps file containing the vector artwork. You're welcome to use the glyphs however you choose, but you may not resell them.

name: Brooklyn Bridge Shipping (United States)
description:

Your copy of this artwork is protected with a 1mm polyethylene bag, rolled, and shipped in a 6"x24" heavy-duty Kraft tube.
